name: 3 Night's At BanBan's Kindergarten
description:
3 Night's  At BanBan's Kindergarten Is A    Point And Click Style Survival Horror Game Where You Play As A Nightwatch Looking Over A Kindegarten School Known As BanBan's Kindergarten. 

BanBan's Kindergarten Welcomes With Open Arms    As You Join The NightShift! Can You Keep The Mascots At Bay And Find Out The Truth?

DEVELOPMENT TEAM MEMBERS:

@SunnehBoi    - Owner | Creator | Programmer | Story Director

NinjaAbdy - Made The Art Original Art Vectors

Nuate - Voice Actor

CREDITS:

Garten Of BanBan Series By: Euphoric Brothers

Five Night's At Freddy's Series By: @realscawthon 

#fnaf #fangame #horror #survival #pointnclick #gartenofbanban
